Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

A tiny, one person craft went through time to Prehistoric Earth, the pilot =
looking to help out in the war, since he graduated from his army fighting s=
chool that his father took him to. It took a long time. Too long, since he =
flunked out more than once and took the whole thing over again so many time=
s. But he finally got it right, and went to assist the Maximals in this war=
. He looked for a clear place to land, and decided that a fine place would =
be near that base with the fight going on. It just may be the Maximals, may=
be they were attacking someone. He started in for a landing. Diskus looked =
up and seen the ship.

Diskus: Diskus came in ship. Not one that big, but b=
ig. uzz, Mr, heeheehee...

Klant, still carrying Orion, stayed clear of the=
 battle, but he still seen the ship.

Klant thinking: Great, some new Allia=
nce guy coming, probably, the Maximals, how shall they survive this? They c=
an't survive such an onslaught. He would have to try and jump the Alliance =
member after he landed, he's fresh and new and perhaps even powerful, and I=
 can't just stand here and let the Maximals down.

The ship tried to maneuv=
er past the gun fire, and the pilot thought it would be best to land a shor=
t distance from the battle, he started landing in what seemed like a good s=
pot. Thus begins the story of Tarantopulous...
